timeline.message:
cli: windows: Set internal JRE

Fixes #1067

Internal JRE was not selected when external JRE is not available.
This caused the toolkit to be unusable in windows ENVs

runtime: cli: Fix error log in startup

Fixes #1107

No need to pass the command name to tools lib now. It only contain
one command at the moment.
CONF_OUT_FILE is not written to disk if observability configuration
is not found on the micro-gw.conf file. Therefore error log should
not be printed if CONF_OUT_FILE is not found

cli: build: Fix build status message

Having the build status message in a separate line make thing look
unproffessional. Therefore this commit take required actions to
get the status message in to the same line as " Generating sources"
message.
Proto compiler download messages were replaced with progress dots,
if we need to debug any issue with the download we can request for
the log while as it contains the file name and few other info.

cli: build: Fix build status message

Having the build status message in a separate line make thing look
unproffessional. Therefore this commit take required actions to
get the status message in to the same line as " Generating sources"
message.
Proto compiler download messages were replaced with progress dots,
if we need to debug any issue with the download we can request for
the log while as it contains the file name and few other info.

timeline.bodyText: IMO, we should check if an executable java file is inside the JAVA_HOME as well. And besides that, we should check if it is java 1.8
timeline.author: VirajSalaka
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -52,37 +50,20 @@ SET BALLERINA_HOME=%MICROGW_HOME%\lib\platform
 if NOT EXIST %BALLERINA_HOME% SET BALLERINA_HOME="%MICROGW_HOME%\lib"
 
 SET PATH=%BALLERINA_HOME%\bin\;%PATH%
-if %verbose%==T ECHO BALLERINA_HOME environment variable is set to %BALLERINA_HOME%
-if %verbose%==T ECHO MICROGW_HOME environment variable is set to %MICROGW_HOME%
 
 REM Check JAVA availability
-:checkJavaHome
-	if "%JAVA_HOME%" == "" goto noJavaHome
-	if NOT EXIST "%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java.exe" goto noJavaHome
-goto checkJava
+if EXIST "%JAVA_HOME%" (
+	ECHO JAVA_HOME: %JAVA_HOME%
+) else (
+	SET JAVA_HOME=%MICROGW_HOME%\lib\jdk8u202-b08-jre
+)
